content.detailedDescription: Got to tell you...Getting so busy over head anymore it's too often to report? but beginning to think i/we( wife & i) are able to talk about them and the next night they are out there? we have had reported before and met with the mufon rep for southern oregon(personal interview last fall). they, the objects appear "star like" but move around like they are "playing/showing off for us when we see and watch them? we just step out the door to have a smoke...Walk to the parking lot( 25 ft.) and look up. we ask "if we have anybody up there tonight?" usually a couple through the night? but tonight it started with 1 and as we "acknowledged it" more began to just appear and then at least 6-7 by 15 min and had to come in cause our "necks hurt". thanks. time is at hand and i know there are "millions of craft" above gaia right now. just felt like a good one of the bunch to report..Lot's of "energy" with this one. exciting!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Started with 1 and then as wife and i watched  we ended with 6 or 7 total over 15 min time.

content.detailedDescription: I was setting out on our deck at noon. the sun was overhead and the sky was a brilliant blue.  a clould had moved over the sun, making  beautiful  colors.  i couldn't look right at it so i held my phone over my head and snapped a few pictures.  later when i looked at them i noticed a small bluish green orb in all the pictures.  it seems to have a dark cone shape shadow or something near it in all the pictures.  it might not be anything, but it seems odd to me.  the object changed positions from one picture to the next.  it was really close to the sun so there way noway to see it with the naked eye.  i blew it off as a reflection of some kind, but it has been eating at me that this is something different.
content.summary: The sun was behind some clouds and looked cool so i held my camera over my head and snapped some blind shots. when i took a look there was this odd sphere in all the pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the beach flying a training kite at 3:30pm, when i saw a equilateral triangular craft with three powerful white lights, one at each vertex. it was 30 degrees to the right of the sun. it was stationary, at an altitude higher than commercial jets. there was a clear blue sky. i saw it for around 12 seconds, then it vanished by apparently rising to a higher altitude. it vanished as if rising above clouds, but there were no clouds. in other words, it seemed to get higher into the stratosphere. an equilateral triangle with three bright lights at the vertices. i saw a grayish structure. i estimate the size to be around the length of 3 commercial jets.
i'm a civil engineer, aerospace and aeronautics enthusiast, astronomer and plane spotter. 
i've been flying remote controlled airplanes and helicopters for 25 years. i know what i saw. a 12 year old kid next to me also saw the object.
content.summary: Equilateral triangle ufo with powerful white lights at each of the vertices. hovering above 40,000ft, longer than 3 commercial jets.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1968, when i was 10 years old, at about 10pm on a july summer night, my family was driving home and i saw a really really red light moving down the road from east to west. when my family got home i jumped out of the car yelling ufo, because i could still see the red light moving down the road.My brother and sister saw it too. i then noticed the sky was very dark and was blackened out by a massive ship that the red light was attached to. as it moved away down the road, it blackened out the whole sky. we watched it move over the trees until we could not see it anymore.
there was no wind, it was calm, and no sound was made, i couldn't even hear insects.

about a year later, in july of 1969, at night while sleeping,i felt i floated through my window and screen, and ended up on a table somewhere else.  there was a very pure white light on the right side and it was pitch dark on the opposite side. there were three little grays near me, and two or three taller greys standing a little further off. i talked to them telepathically to let me see, let me see, and i saw, like it was invisible, my back yard with a tree and no pump house. i thought that was strange, we had no tree there. it was enjoyable and i felt they gave me a look into the future. 20 years later i went home and my folks had planted a tree and taken out the pump house.
when i i woke up it was almost 11am and i had missing time. i jumped up and couldn't find my brother and sister. when they finally came in i asked where they were and they said they didn't know.

about three years ago some friends were over and one of them was taking pictures. when she took a picture of me, i saw a gold orb shoot from her hand towards my face. when the picture was developed, 5 or 6 orbs were in the picture.

maybe someone else saw the ship in 1968, i just wanted to see if anyone else had seen anything.
content.summary: When i was about 10 years old my sister and broter and i saw a hugh ship that blackened out the sky  with a really red led type light we could see

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting in my garden, soon after watching the iss pass over, i noted what appeared to be an iridium flare in gemini. the "flare" brightened as a flare should as it passed between castor and pollux. it faded, and then "flared" again; a behavior that i had not seen in an iridium flare before. 

i estimate that at its brightest, the object was slightly brighter than pollux, i.E., ~1.0 magnitude. 

according to heaven's above, there were no iridium satellites anywhere near this location at the time of the sighting.
content.summary: Star-like

content.detailedDescription:
On 25.09.2013 i was in the countryside near sofia. so i was just playing with my phone taking pictures. i've decided to take image of blue sky with airplane passing over. at this moment nothing curious happened until few days after i began checking what i've made. i've made a sequence of 3 photos.
first one is taken at 10:05:27 and there is nothing interesting (20130925_100527.Jpg), second one at 10:05:29 which is only 2 seconds from the first one when the object is visible in front of the airplane (20130925_100529.Jpg) and third one is at 10:05:40 where is also nothing interesting (20130925_100540.Jpg).
the coordinates are 
latitude = 42°57'56.1016"
longitude = 23°24'42.6736"
content.summary: Asymmetrical shaped object

content.detailedDescription: this morning about 5:45 a.M. hear in las vegas, nv i had exited the place i work at to go in another set of doors i had looked up towards the northeast to see if the rain clouds had started to come in. when i noticed a bright star. i thought what planet is that? being is was close to sunrise. i thought maybe venus or jupiter, but i remembered that they are in the night sky at this time. i looked up at it,and swear i saw it move a little. started walking again stopped again. and the same. i went to the sidewalk and have security guard look up at it. but it was gone
content.summary: Observed a star like object.

content.detailedDescription: The video shows all. takes about 15 seconds before it shows on trial cam
content.summary: 6 square lights horizontal

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching a satellite or the iss travel sw. then two orange-red lights/orbs or something linear (?) with lights at the ends caught my eye, seemibly secretly, flying the opposite direction north. not really sharp or in focus. 

it/they were travelling in a straight trajectory but it was like watching a truck in front of you going straight, and if the frame alignment is off it appears as though its travelling on an angle.

if they were separate the motion/inertia looked as though it was linked somehow, the way a single object would move. like a flashlight with lights at each end. there were no visible connections however.

bonafide flying something from somewhere or here!!??

in addition to this story, and instead of creating another report for this small sighting, a little while later i saw two small flashes high in the sky approximately where the head of the constellation lynx and the head of ursa major (bear) meet. the two flashes were offset by ~ width or ones hand.
content.summary: 2 orbs flying in tandem in a straight line. flight configuration ~ 40deg vetical

content.detailedDescription: I was taken a few shots with my new canon camera of chemtrails and clouds,my favorite,past time ,i saw the picture i wanted to shoot,and i found this object,i have found other objects also,i also live near and airport and national guard base.I also found a face in the clouds. i was amazed of what i found,i have shone other people and are  in awe,i lost sight of the object when i went to change settings on camera,i have a sense about many things in nature,that are hid.I just know when to take a shot with my camera,after my brief dying after being hit but a tree,i have had this sense. i sent a couple of of photos to show my stile .
content.summary: Taken a shot  with new camera of clouds,brought it in a found the object in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I can't say anything any more detailed.. it was just a unbelievable..
i was in a big problem.. & i was thrown outside the house during my family fight..I was kept outside the house for due to some family issue..!! i was outside the house & i was standing.. that time , i just saw it... ufo!!~ 
i gonna be the ufo-scientist.. & i was just 16teen year old that time.. now.., soon i will be 18teen.. & i also made ufo-contacts many a times.. i tried to contact ufo's & then i saw it during the event!!~! it was a miracle that i saw ufo in my real problem!!~ i got some powers to contact the ufo's by my mind.. i also did one experiment to contact ufo.. & i was success.. i also got some of their responses.. & many a times also seen many ufo's!!~
content.summary: It was just a shocking...

content.detailedDescription: 4:25 pm standing outside my house,watching weather condition,watching for dark clouds,orb like object appeared from behind the cloud,appeared in east direction,no sound,constant speed,disappeared.
content.summary: White orb moving in constant speed east direction

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

excursions towards "laguna de la plata", "san fabian de alico - chile". we stopped to rest and drink water. take the camera a sony handycam dcr dvd650 model and made a zoom out mountain.

de excursión rumbo a "laguna de la plata", "san fabián de alico - chile". paramos a descansar y beber agua. tome la cámara, una sony handycam modelo dcr dvd650 e hice un zoom out a la montaña.


2. what made you first notice the object?

at the time we did not notice anything. when we saw the film, we see something strange.

en el momento no notamos nada. cuando vimos la filmación, observamos algo extraño.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

i thought it was an insect like a fly that was crossed by the camera.

pensé que era un insecto como una mosca que se cruzo por la cámara.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

descends at high speed in curve

descenso a gran velocidad de forma curva. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.


feelings: normal
reaction: doubts
action: upload the video to youtube in private mode. today is already public

i have only the concern that it may be, if it is a bug or an unidentified object.



sentimientos: normal
reacción: dudas
acción: subi el video a youtube en modo privado. hoy ya es público

solo tengo la inquietud de que pueda ser, si es un insecto o un objeto no identificado.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

low at high speed, and decreases before disappearing behind the mountain.

baja a una gran velocidad, y disminuye antes de perderse detrás de la montaña.
content.summary: Strange object descending at high speed. extraño objeto descendiendo a gran velocidad.

content.detailedDescription: The bright orb moved very slow and had none of the required faa lights. it was stationary overhead for a solid two minutes before continuing the the north east. the object would fade then brighten until it just stopped and faded away before reaching n.East horizon ..
content.summary: I was standing at my backdoor when i observed a bright circular light coming from the west moving slowly to the east. then became stationary over head for a few moments the proceeded to the northeast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in northbrook, il. i was having a cigarette outside my boyfriend's work. you can see the stars pretty well out there some nights (like tonight) and there was one that i assume is the north star but am not sure. i asked him if it was the north star, and as he tried to remember i could see that what looked like a very bright star was moving from the top right of the bright star we were observing, toward the left and lowering. there were easily three planes in the area at the time, all which were staying parallel to the ground, all blinking lights, and if not they were all tens of miles (easily) lower than this very bright star-like object. the reason i was amazed is that you could tell that this thing must have been something incredible to give off such a bright light from so far away, and the best part was that the north star was a perfect point of reference to see how fast and far the object was actually going. my boyfriend is a serious skeptic, and he witnessed a ufo with me in michigan last summer, which he now doesn't like to admit. he tells people "i don't know it was something", despite watching it zig zag and blast off at insane speeds and distance. this is important to note because he said "it could be a plane... no that's definitely not a plane, because that's a plane... it could be a satellite... no wait it's moving so weird though, wait is it stopping? it stopped? it's moving again..." etc. he is completely dumbfounded with what we just saw. although we didn't see the craft in detail, it was certainly moving completely unlike any man-made aircraft. there is a zero percent doubt in my mind that this was extra terrestrial. so here is a detailed description of the sighting:

1. we look at this bright star, we see that a round, bright star-like craft is directing itself from the top right of the star (i believe it was north east and moving westward), sort of wobbling up and down but still with observable control. 
2. it then flew (the movement was very fluid and natural) down passed the star until it was equal distance away from the star as it was when we first saw it, only on the other side and below instead of above the star. it kept moving left. it moved up and down in a shallow zigzag and the light was still white and remaining steadily lit, no fluttering or change in size of the object was visible yet.
3. there were 2 points during its path where it stopped, wavered a little, then continued.
4. it got about 5x-6x the distance away from the star, still going left, but starting to move upward. at this point the light was more dim and the object appeared slightly smaller/further away. then it just disappeared in about 2 seconds, like maybe it dissipated or perhaps shot off too quickly  for my eyes to adjust. then it was gone. this whole thing lasted between 2-3 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a bright light move strangely and purposefully for about 2.5 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Stars i was preparing to use my telescope in a clear night full of bright when i saw two bright lights traveling  together very high up in the sky close to the stars...From the south to the north crossing the space and disappearing in a vertiginous speed but after a few minutes i saw them again coming back from the north to the south as if they were guarding the earth space, or perhaps preventing other races from coming in contact with humans on earth...
the second night i saw them again and i could look at them with my binoculars and one of them show a tremendous super bright red white light as if was exploding,  i was not the only one that saw that light as if was a huge explosion without sound.  then after that moment i only saw one traveling  this time from east to west very fast.    
third day i saw only one craft traveling crossing the sky so fast  from different directions... my thought was that if i could see them without binoculars in clear view what size of their craft they must have been?  in different occasions i saw a similar ufo craft crossing the moon from up to all the way down in an incredible speed and other days i saw the same black craft crossing the moon from right to left, and viceversa. 
i am incline to think that these ufo's and craft i saw this last time in utah are nothing less than american ufo's  living in the moon or another planet...Preventing the visit of other humans or other beings to visit  or help humans on planet earth...  no one can convince me otherwise!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two start bright light traveling together and one sims as it exploted in the high up sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside doing school work and my boyfriend (works night shift outside) called me at 9:45pm and told me to look outside next to the moon and see if i have ever noticed "that star" next to it. upon arrival i immediately knew it was no star. it was very bright almost like a planet and it looked like a cross or diamond but nothing that i have seen before, i have never seen anything in the sky so bright just sitting there. i got goose bumps and excited and scared/curious at the same time. my reaction while on the phone was "that's no star". i also noticed a plane headed that direction and was able to compare and it was definitely not a plane. i went inside because my daughter is asleep and i need to do my school work but i am going to go outside after i'm done to take another look. this is our second ufo sighting since we moved here in september 2014.
content.summary: Bright star looking ufo hovering right next to the moon

content.detailedDescription: i was  at work waiting to punchout and the guys were playing football , i was following the football as it was thrown in the air and that's when i noticed it . at first i thought it was a metallic ballon but then i realized that it was traveling at a high rate of speed like a plane would . it was simply flying in a straight path , it had no wings and seemed to glide through the air but what was most peculiar was its shape . this may sound  crazy but it appeared to have a metallic hamburger type of shape ! i had a clear  view of it for  a couple of seconds as it traveled in a patch of blue sky and then it was barely visible as it went into another cloud formation and disappeared . i asked my co-worker to look up in the direction of the object but to no avail it was gone ! my friend said he believed because he had witnessed a ufo as a teen . also there were several planes that passed by in the same general are but none of them were flying above the clouds as the the ufo was .
content.summary: Metallic hamburger shaped ufo over cloudy skies.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting out back around 6:30 pm, no clouds in the sky except one fair weather cloud heading towards me and almost overhead. the cloud was at an altitude where piper cub planes normally fly. the cloud was approx. 1000' long, 300' wide and 300' tall. the bottom half of the cloud was white and the top half was dark. as i'm looking at the cloud a circle formed. as i focused on the circle i noticed there was flat rotation of the clouds that made up the circle. i cannot remember which direction it was rotating. it was rotating at about 5 rpm. the circle was approx. 75'-100' in diameter. after about 5 seconds the rotation started to lower and with it came more clouds forming a short, straight walled funnel that came down about 100' and then stopped lowering. with-in a few seconds the rotation started going back up the inside of the funnel leaving the walls of the funnel intact. the walls were approx. 20' thick. as it got about 20' into the funnel the appearance of the rotating clouds turned into a very bright white smooth and perfectly round, 100" diameter object with a slight convex bottom. the object moved another 50' upward then in a blink of the eye it shot upwards through the remainder of the cloud. there was about a 400' spray of clouds that shot out of the top of the cloud from the punch hole. when i looked up the hole as it passed overhead i could see the walls were as smooth a drill hole in a piece of wood. i could see the white and dark cloud layer inside the hole. 
it was a clear dry evening with calm winds and only that one fair weather cloud. there was no other unusual movement with-in the cloud. 
pretty cool!
content.summary: Ufo sighting through cloud leaving punch hole and cloud spray above cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
Well basically i reside in the west midlands within the u.K. on the 21/04/15 (in american) 04/21/15 i think i witnessed what was a ufo. i was at my nans house just having a drink with my cousin as it was his birthday the day before. at the time of the sighting i had, had about 2 budweiser bottles and about 2-3 small glasses of apple sourz, so a fairly pathetic amount of alcohol to assume i was drunk enough to imagine these images or sightings. 
   most times on a pissup night i go outside with my mates while they smoke bud, jus to chill. while they smoke bud ill sit having a drink. but alot of the time im sitting just looking up at the night sky. in this particular moment i had had around 3 bottles and a few glasses of sourz, so i was fairly sober. i sat down looking up for about 5 minutes and i saw all the stars as still as usual in the night sky. then i saw an object which was the same colour as the star it appeared to hit (yellow) then change direction. 
     when i first saw the object i only noticed it for about 3-4 seconds at which through those small seconds i thought it was a shooting star. but then when it changed direction (after literally looking like it hit the star) which i know is impossible but after losing the object my cousin who witnessed the next direction of the object and watched it as it dissapeared.
     at first my feelings were amazement that i had just witnessed what i percieved to be a u.F.O. but then my feelings turned to dismay as my only witness didnt see the key event of the event itself which was the sudden change of direction. 
     the object was lost sight of as my witness of the event watched it as it went across the night sky and just carried on padt the naked eye to see.
content.summary: Shooting star like object hit star in the sky, went around or hit then travelled in totally different direction

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i have been witnesses to multiple, reoccurring ufo sightings. we initially thought there were only 2 ufo's but as time went on, on non-cloudy evenings when we have a clear view, we have increased our estimated number to 20 and over.

the very first time i noticed these ufo's was march 2/2015 at approx. 6:30-7:00pm. i was walking my dog along the path that runs parallel to lake ontario behind my apartment building in downtown kingston ontario when i suddenly noticed an extremely bright, almost golden-colored object in the sky while i was looking towards the south west. i was roughly 100 yards from my building and started to record a video right away. i immediately speculated it to be a ufo and ran inside to tell my boyfriend. from our living room window we could see the "main one" (that is what we call the ufo that appears closest to us, the first one we saw) as it hovers in the sky (we estimate between 500 ft-1 mile upwards) seemingly trying to pass off as an ordinary star in the sky. i could have easily mistook it/them for a star, as most everyone else seems to do, if not for that first sighting where it's unnaturally bright, golden presence stuck out like a sore thumb. since that first sighting, however, it/they do not exude that same amount of intense brightness that made me first take notice, but instead look like very bright stars that are easily unnoticed by everyone and lacking anything out of the ordinary on first glance.

both he and i noticed that the object appeared to be spinning extremely fast so we went to the roof to record more videos and take a closer look. once there, we also  noticed a second object that appeared quite a bit further away (maybe 2 miles above us) towards the east. we observed them for hours, spinning and hovering and flashing white lights. later that evening, i watched the "main one" from my apartment window as it slowly receded further away towards the south west until it was out of view (this was around 9pm). the second ufo was still visible (and more or less in the same spot - from our point of view) when we went to bed around 3am and it stayed for an unknown amount of time afterwards.

since that night, we have noticed these "stars" nearly every single night (except when it is cloudy). it is hard to say whether there has always been a large number of them the whole time (approx. between 20-40) and we never noticed them before or if their numbers are increasing over time. there are certain nights when they seem particularly "active"; a lot of hectic spinning, lights flashing, shape shifting (usually while they are spinning, they crunch up into a ball or stretch themselves out so they become elongated), plenty of which can be seen with the naked eye when one is paying attention. for the first time the other night, we viewed the ufo's with binoculars and we were able to see what appeared to be a dark, metallic craft, triangular in shape, with three white lights down the bottom/center and one red and one blue light above them. the view was not perfectly clear though, so i'm certain we haven't seen all the details yet. 

this has all been occurring since march 2/2015 and, provided it isn't too cloudy tonight, i am certain i will be seeing them again in the next coming hours. my boyfriend and i have tried telling/showing people about all of this but, aside for a few friends that have seen them with their own eyes and can back our story up, for the most part, people seem to not want to believe it. i, for one, am eager for answers. the overall feeling i get about this whole situation is (and has been from the start) positive and it brings me a lot of excitement. i have acquired a fair number of videos taken from my cellphone, however, the quality does not fully convey everything visually as it appears to us in real life.
content.summary: Multiple ufo's seen repeatedly in same location, disguised as stars.

content.detailedDescription: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Plaese watch the video, it was just an orb then other orbs.

content.detailedDescription: We seen it up north a mistory light paulding light i taped it see for your self when show u tape . im 49 years old i like your show and thought it is time i show it to u . i showed it to a video ticnition at local collage n he said i have got on tape he could make . i did not stage it is a live fotage. come see for your self .
content.summary: We where wacthing for paulding light to come out n got it on video .

content.detailedDescription: i was looking at the brightest  stars in the sky that night with my new telescope as i was putting it away some thing caught my eye i looked up south and at that same moment this huge bright orb started moved east i thought for a moment it was a plane coming at me because  that's what it looks like when it is facing you with its head lights but after a minute it was clear to me that it  wasn't a plane of any kind, after all i have been star gazing for a few years now so i know whats up there and what to look for ,it was about bigger and brighter then anything i have witnessed in the night sky,so then after a minute of watching it it slowly went out then got bright again and then it was gone.I know what i saw,i believe in the bible they are called wondering stars .It was a star that came down here to earth for whatever reason .
content.summary: Like a huge star came down and slowly moved in a strait path above our naborhood ,it was unbelievable

content.detailedDescription: It was 10 minutes before i started my shift at work so i went behind our building to smoke a cigarette. after lighting a cig to the corner of my eye 3 orbs as orange as the end of my smoke began to ascend and cross the sky. a few more appeared and i rushed to get my phone out. i had experienced seeing ufos 2 other times in my life and never got a chance to take pictures. i knew instantly what i was witnessing. after a few clicks i decided to try make a video but for some reason i couldn't see them on it so i switched back to the camera and took a few more clicks. then i just watched as the continued their journey across the sky..Ascending more and more and then just disappearing. i felt great. i finally got some pictures of them :d.
content.summary: About 12 flying orange orbs across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
1) sitting in my backyard looking west. i was using a skyview app on my ipad trying to see what the names of the stars or planets were out that night.
2) i was looking in that direction already. it appeared over the trees from behind a higher group of trees (a ravine is right behind my house).
3) i first thought it was a meteor.
4) it then travelled in a straight line south to north approxiamtely an arms length in flight.
5) i was in analysis mode afterward trying detrermine what i had just seen so made some notes on my ipad. i wasnt overly enthused as it could very well have been a meteor for all i know.
6) the head or leading part of the object was a bit wider then the tail. it went from white to yellow to red then just disappeared before it went behind some other trees where i would have lost site.

did it simply burn up or dematerialize? i cant say.
content.summary: Straight line white streak. head changed white to yellow to red then vanished

content.detailedDescription: Last night i walked up to my kitchen sink at about 10:20 pm and thought it was odd to see this bright star in the low western sky outside the window where i don't believe i've seen a bright star or planet before in 17 years of living in my home. looked like bright venus but the light was fluttering like a star. i thought it might be slowly moving around. i opened the window expecting to hear a distant helicoptor sound, but could detect no sound. it just didn't seem that far away (10 miles or so perhaps.) i watched it for about 15-20 min. color of light was not toward the orange or blue, just similar to what venus might look like. looking at it with not very strong binoculars didn't give much info, but it looked smaller and was not at all fluttering through the binoculars. my iphone compass showed it at 272 degrees west; then a minute or two later it was clearly at 284 degrees and then i realized that it was indeed drifting out of position. over the next several minutes it slowly desended in an arc and i finally lost sight of it at 10:35 pm at 340 degrees west. i drew a diagram using the roof of the house across the street with its smoke stack, vent pipe and nearby tree to be able to determine just where it was when i cane upon it and exacting where it dissapeared behind the roof.
content.summary: Like bright venus where it never is. hovered with slow descending movement

content.detailedDescription: At home. was playing guitar inside my room. i usually do this after i end up doing my guitar practices i go out and have some fresh breathe. then i was like looking up in the sky and i noticed a light just above my head around 3-4floor above a dim light was like still and then was revolving circle. i went inside to call my mother but unfortunately i couldn't see more of it.
content.summary: It was kind of sphere,twinkling at the beginning,then static and then moving in circle.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 11 pm - 12 am on march 18th 2015. both my boyfriend and i were out in the backyard watching the stars because it was so clear out no clouds in the sky. i looked to my left and saw a very bright object. it was very bright and large. it was moving oddly. not like a plane or shooting star it was moving in very distinct fluid like movements. it moved down to the left then seemed to shift/tilt back and moved fast to the right. this seemed to happen multiple times. as it moved its shape seemed to be disc like but it was so far away. its lights were a orange- yellow-red color to it. my boyfriend was watching with me. i was yelling "what the hell is that? do you see what im seeing?" this blew my mind. i have never seen anything like this before. it then seemed to just take off toward utica very fast and it was gone. we remained outside for a couple of hours looking for it again but didn't see it. we did see a plane and the lights and size was tiny compared to what we had just saw and the plane was very slow compared to the object we had just seen. absolutely mind blowing!
content.summary: My boyfriend and i saw a very bright object move in a very fast fluid like movement. it would move downmard than up to the left then quickley back to the right it was fast and this happened multiple times then accellerated toward utica ny.

content.detailedDescription: I went out side to let dog out and always look into sky.I saw  bright star in yhe sky almost above and it was moving slow..About 9:30 pm 4/20/15 this object was about was north at 10:00 and moved slow then brightened as it moved sse in a straight line a sped up and shot across the sky like a slow shootin star.And then it got smaller and smaller till it dimmed out and disappeared...All this took about about 5 secondsor less..
content.summary: I went outside and looked into the sky and saw a big star..It looked like moving slow...Sse it brightened and picked speed and crossed the horizon  seconds ans then faded out.
